attributes.action: Call a General Election for the public to decide who should be Prime Minster.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like this country to have a Prime Minster who has gone to the Polls and won a General Election. Gordon Brown has been given the job behind closed doors and the public did not have a say in this matter. The public should be given the opportunity to elect all our Leaders and Member of Parliament and we have not been given this chance

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
